Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored a goal after 73 seconds
Kevin De Bruyne sealed Belgium's win over Romania with a late goal
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco praised his team's performance and booked the three points
Edward Iordanescu acknowledged the difficulty of the group and emphasized the need for solidarity and unity
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was an incredible game full of chances
The atmosphere in Cologne was astonishing
Others: Belgium is still ranked third in the world by FIFA
Romania have failed to qualify for the last six World Cups following their golden era of the 1990s
